General.Name: Pangang Group Vanadium Titanium & Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: Pangang Group Vanadium & Titanium Resources Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sales, technology research and development, and application development of vanadium and titanium products in China and internationally. The company provides vanadium products, including vanadium pentoxides, vanadium trioxide, vanadium oxide, vanadium iron, vanadium nitrogen alloy, and vanadium aluminum alloy; and titanium products comprising titanium dioxides and slags, ilmenite, and titanium raw materials, as well as electrolyte products. It also engages in electricity business. The company's products are used in iron and steel, electronics, non-ferrous metals, selling well, and coating ink industries, as well as nonferrous metallurgy, chemical industry, energy, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as Pangang Group Steel Vanadium & Titanium Co.,Ltd.Pangang Group Vanadium & Titanium Resources Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Panzhihua, China.
